metadata.name: Transparent Motel #1: Unexpected Guest
metadata.description:
Why are cats so sensitive to the otherworld?

In a pre-dawn dream, the boundary between this and the other world blurs, becomes transparent and barely perceptible. A person becomes vulnerable and lost. Just like in a roadside motel with its plywood walls and numerous stories and traces of the presence of other people.
In graphic editors, transparency is displayed as a checkerboard. And also the checkerboard symbolizes the presence of black and white in our lives at every step, this and the other world.

3D rendered, 1920x1920 px, mp4
